snippet.title: Imaginary Friend Asylum | Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2643930/Imaginary_Friend_Asylum/

Imaginary Friend Asylum is a psychological horror game about being neurodivergent in the 1940s. You're in a cruel world but your imaginary friends have your back. You've been admitted to a children's insane asylum. Here, you will uncover a dark conspiracy where you are to receive a terrible fate.

This game is a prequel to "The Friends We Left Behind."
© 2023 Grant Marrs
